bioconda.name: bioconductor-oligoclasses
bioconda.summary: Classes for high-throughput arrays supported by oligo and crlmm

biotools.summary: This package contains class definitions, validity checks, and initialization methods for classes used by the oligo and crlmm packages.

bioschemas.name: oligoClasses
bioschemas.summary: This package contains class definitions, validity checks, and initialization methods for classes used by the oligo and crlmm packages.
